name: Rio Warzone
description:
Wotson is a novice soldier in the special services of Rio de Janeiro, he will have to show his worth facing the most dangerous bandits.
Seizing narcotics and money will be your goals in this game. You can see how much has been seized and meet extra goals.

This FPS game has the basic movements: walking, running, jumping, throwing grenades, shooting and reloading weapons.

You can shoot enemies in the legs causing them to stop shooting and be exposed. Don't forget that shooting in the head is fatal.

Weapon customization, day and night missions are an attraction of the game.

You can break in like homes to look for drugs and money from dealers.

This is a true superhero game.
